content: Hi, I have outlet issue. Need someone to check it out.
Hello! Need fan installation in living room. When can you come?

Hello Robert,

Thank you for reaching out to Mikhail's Fixes regarding your outlet issue. We appreciate your trust in our services.

The quoted price for checking and resolving the outlet issue is $120.00.

I understand the importance of ensuring your outlets are working properly and I will be happy to assist you with this. Could you please provide a convenient time for our technician to come and inspect the issue?

Once we have a scheduled time, our team will promptly address the problem and ensure your outlets are functioning perfectly.

Looking forward to helping you resolve this issue.

Best regards,
Mikhail's Fixes

Dear Lisa Martinez,

Thank you for reaching out to Mikhail's Fixes for your fan installation needs. I appreciate the opportunity to assist you with this project.

I can accommodate your request for a fan installation in your living room for the quoted price of $120.00. I am available to come by at your convenience. Please let me know your preferred date and time, so we can schedule the installation.

Looking forward to helping you create a more comfortable living space with your new fan. Feel free to contact me with any further questions or to confirm the appointment.

Best regards,

Mikhail

Dear Robert Wilson,

Thank you for reaching out to Mikhail's Fixes regarding the outlet issue in your home. We appreciate the opportunity to assist you with this matter.

The quoted price for the service is $120.00, which includes the inspection and necessary repairs for your outlet issue.

To address your specific needs, our technician will visit your home at a convenient time for you to assess the outlet problem and provide a solution. Please let us know your availability so we can schedule a service appointment that works best for you.

If you have any further questions or would like to proceed with the service, feel free to contact us at your earliest convenience.

Thank you again for choosing Mikhail's Fixes. We look forward to resolving your outlet issue promptly and effectively.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
Mikhail's Fixes

Hello Lisa Martinez,

Thank you for reaching out to Mikhail's Fixes for your fan installation needs. I appreciate the opportunity to assist you with this project.

I can definitely help with installing the fan in your living room for the quoted price of $120.00. I am available to come by for the installation at your convenience. 

Could you please provide me with your preferred date and time for the service? Once confirmed, I will ensure everything is taken care of efficiently.

Looking forward to working with you on this project!

Best regards,
Mikhail
